set

update

public void update(Rectangle r)
marks a portion of the image component as dirty. The region will be pushed to the graphics card on the next frame.

Parameters:
r -

sets the data for the image

updateArea

public void updateArea(int dstX,
                       int dstY,
                       int areaWidth,
                       int areaHeight)
This must be called by the TextureShaderPeer to propagate image data from the image to the byte array and finally to the byte buffer. Note: dstY is in the parameter because it's already flipped (see update)
